faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.text: We want to make the process easier for you. Here are frequently asked questions and answers.

faq.question_1: Can I complete the car rental process online?
faq.answer_1: Yes, you can complete the entire rental process online through our website, make the payment, and choose your pickup location.
faq.answer_2: Yes, you can cancel your reservation for free up to 12 hours before the pickup time.
faq.answer_3: Yes, mandatory traffic insurance is included.
faq.answer_4: The minimum rental period is 1 day. Special offers may be available for long-term rentals.
faq.question_5: Can I return the car in a different city?
faq.answer_5: Yes, returning the car in a different city is possible.
faq.answer_6: There is a daily mileage limit. Details are provided in the vehicle information section.
faq.answer_7: All our vehicles are thoroughly cleaned and sanitized by professional teams after each rental.
faq.question_8: My license is not international, can I still rent a car?
faq.answer_8: If you have a driver's license valid in Turkey, it's not a problem.
faq.question_9: Will I be charged if I return the car late?
faq.answer_9: Delays up to 1 hour are usually tolerated.
faq.question_10: What documents do I need to rent a car?
faq.answer_10: A valid driver's license, an ID, and a credit card are sufficient.
faq.question_11: What is the minimum age to rent a car?
faq.answer_11: The minimum age is usually 21, and you must have held a driver's license for at least 1 year.
faq.question_12: Do I need to wash the car before returning it?
faq.answer_12: No, but if the car is excessively dirty, a cleaning fee may be charged.
faq.question_13: When and how can I use my coupon?
faq.answer_13: You can apply your coupon code on the payment screen after selecting your vehicle and location.
